title: 1BR/1BA in the Marina, Parking, Utilities, Balcony, Roof, Pet Friendly
posting_body: Rent: $5,300/mo.
Security Deposit: 1.5 x Rent
Bedrooms: 1
Bathrooms: 1
Parking: 1 car garage included
Pets: Yes
Available Date: October 1 onward
Lease Term: 1, 1.5, or 2 year
Utilities Included: Water, Garbage, PG&E
Property Type: 768sq
ft. Furnished or Unfurnished
Floors: Hardwood
Laundry:
In building
Amenities: Balcony connected to unit, Roof Deck.
Condo HOA Move-in/Move-out Fees: $100
Application Fee: $40 per person
Renters Insurance: Required
PROPERTY DESCRIPTION:
The beautiful 1 bedroom view unit is located in a highly desirable condo building in the trendy Marina district.
The views look east-ward onto the Fort Mason Great Meadow.
Floor-to-ceiling windows make the unit light and bright.
The living, dining and kitchen area are laid out in an open floor plan.
From the dining and living room area, enjoy a view out to Fort Mason.
The bedroom is generously sized and features plenty of closet space.
It features an open floor plan, private accessed deck, hardwood floors, remodeled kitchen and bathroom.
The bedroom is very quiet as it is located in the back of the unit and away from the living room making it ideal for privacy.
The building is extremely well maintained.
It features an elevator, secured intercom, direct access from the garage to the building and a common laundry room.
The HOA is professionally managed and it possesses the much sought after earthquake insurance.
The neighborhood earns a high WalkScore of 94.
Groceries are convenient with the Safeway a block away and a number of other stores within easy distance.
Enjoy the many restaurant and nightlife options of Chestnut Street close by.
For outdoor activity, you are in one of the best neighborhoods in the City, with easy proximity to the Marina Green, Golden Gate Bridge and Fort Mason.
Transportation options include numerous MUNI bus lines and convenient access to the Golden Gate Bridge.
*Note: Furniture shown is for staging purposes only.
Unit will be delivered unfurnished or Furnished upon request by agreement*
